testcase.summary: Verify that unnecessary folder is removed from folder tree
testcase.description:
Setup: A photo belongs to a folder which has a parent folder. The photo may not belong to any other child folder of that parent
1. Select the photo 2. Go to properties->folders 3. remove the photo from the folder
testcase.expectedresult: 1. Photo selected 2. Folder list displayed in the dialog 3. Both the folder and its parent are removed from folder tree
